about_the_game: This game is a story about elderly English ladies who go to Gambia to find young male companions. This game is an LVG, a Galgame, a virtual novel. This game blends humor, drama, and intrigue as you navigate a story filled with unexpected twists, complex relationships, and heartfelt emotions. In this game, you can experience a lot of interesting content and can understand human nature from a different perspective. This game shows how elderly ladies live their happy foreign lives. This game has diverse side stories to explore, great music, and beautifully illustrated characters!

content_descriptors.notes: This game involves a twerking party. Poor young guys sells themselves to rich women for economic benefits. And content similar to kidnapping behavior, etc.

detailed_description: This game is a story about elderly English ladies who go to Gambia to find young male companions. This game is an LVG, a Galgame, a virtual novel. This game blends humor, drama, and intrigue as you navigate a story filled with unexpected twists, complex relationships, and heartfelt emotions. In this game, you can experience a lot of interesting content and can understand human nature from a different perspective. This game shows how elderly ladies live their happy foreign lives. This game has diverse side stories to explore, great music, and beautifully illustrated characters!
name: My Gambian Boyfriend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: A mature visual novel exploring the relationships between elderly English women and young Gambian men, blending humor and drama while examining desire and humanity.
